text:
José Sumulong Cojuangco Jr. (born José Cojuangco y Sumulong on September 19, 1934), more popularly known as Peping Cojuangco, is a Filipino politician. He was a Philippine Congressman and the 9th president of the Philippine Olympic Committee from 2004 to 2018.
He is the younger brother Corazon Aquino and uncle of Benigno Aquino III, both were Philippine presidents.
